author: stephenh
msg: Updated to the latest build-torque.xml from src/conf to fix the taskdef class ... cannot be found error when invoking the plugin.

author: stephenh
msg: Updated the Howto to reflect the new Maven plugin.

author: stephenh
msg: Minor update to the index.xml doc and added a properties.xml doc to describe the new torque.mavenPlugin.antFile property.

author: stephenh
msg: Created a torque.mavenPlugin.antFile property that defaults to ${maven.home}/plugins/maven-torque-plugin-3.0-rc2-dev/build-torque.xml". Allows users to change which build-torque.xml the plugin uses to execute Torque tasks.
